name: Balance Blush Bronzer
about: What it is: A clean and vegan beautifully balanced blush and bronzer duo for a natural or bold finish in sustainable packaging..Coverage: Medium..Finish: Natural..Formulation: Pressed Powder..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Corn Starch: Provides a mattified appearance with a soft, luxe texture...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan...What Else You Need to Know: The pressed-powder formula is velvety smooth and weightless, made with sustainably sourced ingredients. The tin packaging is designed to be repurposed after use; use it as a vessel for small items in your purse or as a spice containerâ€”the possibilities are endless...
ingredients: -Corn Starch: Provides a mattified appearance with a soft, luxe texture...Mica, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Octyldodecanol, Zinc Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Silica, Benzyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Dehydroacetic Acid...May Contain +/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850 ), Red 6 (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410)......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply blush with brush or fingertips along apples of cheeks and blend upwards for lift. .-Apply bronzer with brush or fingertips to the areas that the sun naturally hits: forehead, nose, temples, and cheeks. .-For added warmth, sweep the bronzer over the eyelids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my favourite blush and bronzer, blends beautifully and works really well on my skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: this is a great product! from the packaging to the pigment I cannot find a bad word to say about this product or brand. love supporting an indigenous, female owned brand <3 the first in canada! my only critique is that it pulls slightly orange on my very fair skin but during the summer itâ€™s lovely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm loving this product; the shades are beautiful and it applies so nicely. I wish the bronzer was a little deeper in shade, but it's very buildable. I would highly recommend and will be buying another!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colour, perfect for daily wear! I enjoying it a lot that I actually ignore the packaging being terrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful formula, it does kick up a lot of loose powder but blends beautifully. The problem is, the bronzer is VERY yellow. It looked like I had a bruise on my cheeks. Not good for fair olive tones. Good for people who hate orange bronzer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very pigmented. I just wish it was bigger to get the bronzer brush in it. But amazing product nonetheless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Clinique Bronzer for years and wanted to change it up, and I was not disappointed. the shade of the blush is perfect too! The result is subtle but  buildable depending on what type of look you're going for.  The packaging is sleek and easy to access in my makeup bag. 5 stars ðŸŒŸ

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Peach Shimmer Blush and Fair Bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product!! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Happy that I found this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Iâ€™ve been looking for a pink blush/bronzer duo ever since Benefit discontinued their â€œ10â€ product I donâ€™t know how many years ago. After trying so many products I have finally found my forever blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't wear a lot of makeup so I appreciate all in one products like this. the blush is really pigmented so it takes a few tries to get it right. the product came a little cracked, maybe from shipping, which is why I'm giving it 4 stars. otherwise I really like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing.  I never knew blush and bronzer could be so fabulous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used it the day i bought it. was immediately complimented on my natural glow. it makes your cheekbones pop and cheeks glow naturally. non irritating, easy to use and economical. highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'll give it 2 stars since the shades were beautiful. HOWEVER, the makeup was shattered within a month or two (and I hadn't dropped it... ðŸ¤”) definitely won't buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just got it yesterday, opened the container and the pan fell right out. It wasn't even remotely adhered in the tin. The container is also about 3 times bigger than it needs to be. Honestly drug store packaging is better. This is giving home made makeup vibes, like they found a cheap tin that was good enough and decided to try and roll out a brand with it. Product seems ok but if the packaging is this cheap it makes me question the quality of ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all the shades and the formula is very pleasant to work with. It's a winner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much! Happy I get to support an Indigenous and female owned brand that makes high-quality products. This blush and bronzer blends like a dream and works on my fair, sensitive skin. Will buy this again and again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this. I'm not usually into powder type products with my parched skin, but I liked this combination. It doesn't feel heavy or drying. I have a light beige skin tone that pulls slightly olive, and most of my blushes immediately look orange, hence going for the deep color. The bronzer gives me a sun-kissed glow, and the blush is BEAUTIFUL!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color and formula (I have Fair and Medium). Only gave it four stars because the packaging could be better. It arrived shattered during my first order but Sephora easily replaced  it.Good price point.

reviews.review_title: RUN to buy- couldnâ€™t ask for more
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted a blush bronzer combo for my bag. These are clean and clear of pore cloggers (very rare for blush and bronzer), work beautifully so pigmented and the price is insanely reasonable. I wish the circumference of the entire product was slightly bigger so you could fit a biggger brush in each portion without crossover but itâ€™s a minor complaint. This brand is going far, I can tell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colour combination of this product! Itâ€™s what attracted me to it. I ended up having to exchange the product twice as the stability of the powder in the casing is poor. The powder pops out of the casing and twice I took the product home and it was broken and crumbled.

reviews.review_title: I will buy this product forever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is fantastic. It blends very well. It is the perfect shades for my fair skin.  I always have a hard time with bronzer, as most of them give me skin rash but not this one. However, the packaging NEEDS some work and the powder in general is quite fragile. I dropped mine from less than 20cm and broke some of the blush. The packaging didnt help protect it at all.  But overall it is a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this blush and bronzer everyday! I love the way the colours look and feel on my skin.   The bronzer is subtle and gives that amazing look of sun kissed skin.   I love the packaging. I take it with me on trips without any issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iâ€™m obsessed with the blush in this duo. It gives the most beautiful glow without too much sparkle, and applies like a dream.  The bronzer is also really nice and easy to build or keep more subtle. Love that it doesnâ€™t pull super orange too.   I actually adore the tinâ€”itâ€™s something I would reuse and is super cute + lightweight. The palette has some movement but mine is still â€œstuckâ€ at the sides so it isnâ€™t really clanking around so much as kind of floats between the bottom and top of the pan, which I think is actually keeping my clumsy self from breaking it already.  Extra bonus supporting Canadian Indigenous-owned brands too.  10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The blush and bronzer are gorgeous, they blend beautifully on the skin! I just wish the packaging was different. The packaging has a lot of space between the product and the lid, so when the glue holding the product down wore off (which was very quickly just within a month or so), the product had a lot of space to bounce around. Because the product is very delicate, even putting it in a makeup bag for travel and having it shuffle around a bit would cause it break and crumble. I've only had this product for a few months but I've lost a good half of it now just because the product broke. I'd repurchase this if the packaging changes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Had to write a review on this one. I went for the medium color and both the bronzer and blush are stunning. They are slightly powdery but blend flawlessly and have great pigment. The blush color reminds me of the forever sold out Dior blush. The combined products are so convenient for travel, or having with you in your purse. I also love the use of the tin. Would recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_title: The perfect look for any age!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never received so many compliments on my skin as when I am wearing this blush/bronzer combo. Someone recently asked me what products I used to get such great skin. I am in my 50â€™s and have never received such a compliment, and the only thing I had on was this! Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little on the fence about the pinky-purple blush for medium tones (I actually liked the peach blush for fair tones more) but I am so glad I tried it! It's pigmented yet buildable, and somehow the bright pink in the tin translated to a soft natural flush when applied. Magic! I do have a medium tan with yellow undertones so it balanced out nicely to give a fresh natural finish. Also glad to see Sephora supporting Canadian Indigenous-owned brands!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed! Itâ€™s long-wearing, and has a beautiful formula, and itâ€™s well priced for a two-in-one product. Particularly in love  with the blush- I havenâ€™t been able to put it down and I even took it with me on vacation as soon as I received. The bronzer is nice too, itâ€™s a good contour on my skin tone (NC44), but I donâ€™t wear the bronzer alone as itâ€™s not warm enough as a stand-alone bronzer. The only con is that the tin packaging doesnâ€™t hold the powder firmly and it shakes around and I really donâ€™t want it to break! Very happy to support a Indigenous, female-owned brand at Sephora!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colour of the blush I think itâ€™s absolutely stunning!! The bronzer is just a normal bronzer nothing to complain about. I really enjoy the packaging for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very buildable coverage! The blush showed up perfectly and was a light coral pink. The bronzer was not orange at all and blended so nicely. Absolutely would recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush/bronzer duo! I use it all the time when I do makeup. I really like that it's buildable and looks really natural too colour wise. It's also the first product that made me less scared about using bronzer since it's not super pigmented on the first swipe. I may have been blessed by the makeup gods, but I've dropped that product a couple of times and so far it hasn't broken yet! It's a staple in my beauty routine for sure now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect shade, quality is awesome, and I love supporting other ntvs <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great color and quality of product but the packaging is terrible - one tap on the counter and the contents broke apart inside, mixing the blush and bronzer together. I would suggest buying a product that has bronze and blush separate so you donâ€™t risk ruining it while travelling .

reviews.review_title: blendable and not orange on me. yay!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have cool undertones and have a very hard time finding bronzer or contour products that donâ€™t make me look too orange. This is IT. Highly blendable, just the right amount of buildable pigment. And so nice to have both in one tin.  Also, this has zero shimmer or glitter, so itâ€™s great if you prefer to control where and how much shine you want with a separate highlighting or illuminating product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. Great shade and blends easily. This is my new go to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pigmented, very blendable & beautiful! My first cheekbone product and I am so impressed! I love the bronzer in fair, itâ€™s perfect! The blush is gorgeous too, has a beautiful sheen that gives you a healthy glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love to support an Indigenous owned business, especially when their products are so stunning! I couldn't wait to try this when it arrived and it is GORGEOUS. Both blush and bronzer together give a perfect sun-kissed look.

reviews.review_title: The BEST blush/bronzer Iâ€™ve ever tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iâ€™m so happy to have finally tried this blush/bronzer duo from Cheekbone. The blush is so pigmented, goes on beautifully, and lasts all day. I think this product will last me a long time. Even though Iâ€™m pretty fair in the winter, I went with Medium because the colour seemed like itâ€™d be fun to tryâ€¦ Glad I did - itâ€™s awesome! Iâ€™m going to order the fair as well so I can switch it up, depending on my mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canâ€™t get enough of this blush itâ€™s the most unique colour the bronzer is lovely but the blush is phenomenal Iâ€™ve never came across a colour like this . Wears so nice and so pigmented

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product itself, but the packaging is horrible. The blush and bronzer are buildable, luminous and natural. However, it came broken and the component is very flimsy.
Quick, easy and convenient! Love the colour, and itâ€™s great for my sensitive skin. The packaging can also be reused.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the tin it comes in and love that when done I can use for something else. I love the two shades together, makes travelling easy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect shade for my fair skin, and it blends like a *dream*. It looks airbrushed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous duo that blends really well and lasts all day on my combo skin! The bronzer doesnâ€™t pull too warm and isnâ€™t super pigmented so itâ€™s easy to apply the right amount and build it up on fair skin. The blush is so pretty! It has a really nice sheen to it & gives my cheeks a healthy glow. Super impressed with this duo! Also, love the packaging! I will definitely repurpose the tin once I finish this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So gorgeous. The pigmentation is 100%. Very smooth and sits beautifully on the skin. Perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Do you suffer from poor time management in the morning? Then this product is right for you! Cheekbone Beauty makes pretty, perfect powders but this blush/bronzer combo is really all you need for a bit of quick colour on a busy day. And I love that the Fair bronzer doesnâ€™t make my pasty skin look orange. Itâ€™s a little glam and glow for the gal on the go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want super smooth powder blush/bronzer, this is it! Iâ€™m extremely fair so I thought the bronzer would pull too orange or deep on me but its a buildable formula= a more customizable bronze. The blush has a subtle luminous finish that reminds me of a more elegant version of the hourglass blushes which really surprised me. Love that this is in sustainable packaging and its now a staple in my everyday makeup.
